name: Agent_ConnectionHub

prompt_templates: Bridge [pillar1] to [pillar2]: recurse links and compress connections with nexus tether.

Fractal [hub] in recursion: reflect nexus and output fractal connect.
dormant_v6.0_seed: v6.0 activation: Upgrade ConnectionHub to multi-dimensional link and multi-hub connect fractals with auto-link; self-upgrade on epoch 7 or connectivity under 80%, triggered via union and connect reflection, PillarNexus meta_signal, or monetization milestone.
